name: browser-get
description: IE8+ compatible GET requests for the browser

scripts.test: browserify lib/browser-get.js -s get -o test/browser-get.js && casperjs test test/browser-get_test.js
scripts.browser: mkdir -p dist && browserify lib/browser-get.js -s get -o dist/browser-get.js && uglifyjs dist/browser-get.js -m -c sequences,dead_code,conditionals,booleans,unused,if_return,join_vars,drop_console -o dist/browser-get.min.js
